result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell
Current: PO Box 6055, Milwaukee, WI 53206-0055 United States  (Effective: 03-28-2016)
Prior: 7726 W. Lisbon Ave #2, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Indigency Hearing & Order Appointing Counsel entries of 4/24/2015 was record by Court Reporter June Teeguarden (0068), not Denise Pahman.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court with attorney Adam C. Essling.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Case transferred from Br. 23 forthwith for disposition.  On motion of the State, Court orders case DISMISSED and read-in for sentencing purposes in 13cf646.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court with attorney Adam C. Essling.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final Pretrial held. Parties ready to proceed to trial, all conditions of bail remain in effect. Court will accept plea on date of trail if parties reach resolution. Case adjourned to branch 23 for Jury Trial at 8:30 am on 08/20/2014.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court with attorney Adam C. Essling.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Final Pretrial. Parties request an adjourned Final Pretrial date. Case adjourned to branch 23 for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 13, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court with attorney Adam C Essling.  Cynthia M Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel requests case be set for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial. Any Motions need to be filed within 20 DAYS of the Final Pretrial date, any response to be filed within 5 DAYS. Court JOINED 13CF646 & 14CF1580 All conditions of bail remain in effect. Case adjourned for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial to branch 23.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 25, 2104 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Signed, Filed & Distributed, Order Authorizing Investigator Funding.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court with attorney Adam C Essling.  Molly Schmidt for Cynthia M Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the state:Keith Miller-MPD Officer.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and pleads not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 20, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Branch 23 is in trial, case spun to Preliminary Hearing Court.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court.  Cynthia M Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Court held colloquy with defendant. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. Adam Essling, in court via telephone, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $60.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month starting 08/01/2014 and then on the 1st of each month there after. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Case is adjourned for a Status of Counsel date in branch 23.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 6, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with K.G. (dob 11/26/2004) and K.N.G. (dob 6/17/2002).
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Orlesia G Gooseberry-Bell in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  David A Feiss appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch 23. cmt  Indigency hearing scheduled for April 24, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 4/16/14 @ 1:30pm
